title: How to View Facebook Messages Without the Messenger Mobile App

steps.title: Open a web browser on your computer or mobile device.
steps.content: Open a web browser on your computer or mobile device. You can use any web browser such as Chrome, Safari, or Opera to view your messages.

steps.title: Navigate to https://www.facebook.com.
steps.content: Navigate to https://www.facebook.com . If using a mobile device, request the desktop version of the site. To do this in Chrome, tap the ⁝ at the top right corner of the browser and select Request desktop site. This reloads the page, giving you access to the version of Facebook you see when you use a computer.

steps.title: Sign in to Facebook.
steps.content: Sign in to Facebook. Type your Facebook username and password into the blanks and tap Log In.

steps.title: Tap the Messages icon.
steps.content: Tap the Messages icon. It’s at the top of the screen and looks like a message bubble with a lightning bolt inside.

steps.title: Tap a message to view its contents.
steps.content: Tap a message to view its contents.

steps.title: Go to https://www.messenger.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.messenger.com in a web browser.

steps.title: Sign in to Messenger.
steps.content: Sign in to Messenger. If you’re prompted to do so, enter your Facebook account information and click Sign In .

steps.title: Click a message to view its contents.
steps.content: Click a message to view its contents. The messages appear in the left panel under the “Messenger” heading.
